climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: One 14 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Therapy Natural Tea Tree Mint Scalp Normalizing Shampoo
pH blanced formula gently cleanses hair and relieves scalp discomfort
Certified organic, plant-based formula made with botanicals and essential oils
No GMOs, parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, or phthalates
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Gently cleanse hair and relieve scalp discomfort with Avalon Organics Tea Tree Mint Scalp Normalizing Shampoo. Made with plant-sourced botanicals and essential oils, this pH balanced formula helps nourish and restore hydration levels to the scalp and hair. Tea tree essential oil, mint, eucalyptus and chamomile work together to gently condition and seal the hair cuticle for soft, shiny hair and a comfortable, balanced scalp. This EWG VERIFIED, certified organic shampoo is made with non-GMO ingredients and no parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, or phthalates. It is also vegan and not tested on animals. Includes one 14 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Tea Tree Mint Scalp Normalizing Shampoo. Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Rooted Beauty Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

Driven by a dedication to organic agriculture and formula transparency, all Avalon Organics products are certified to the NSF/ANSI 305 Standard for Personal Care Products Containing Organic Ingredients*. Through this honest, transparent process, the Avalon Organics brand creates products that are safe, effective and conscious of the greater good. *Claim approval was given on April 11, 2011 from QAI with certificate ID C01655324-NSF3HNPC-5.

Humbled by a profound respect for all living beings, Avalon Organics products are vegan and cruelty-free.* The Avalon Organics brand never tests products on animals, and will only source ingredients that the supplier can document are not tested on animals. This commitment to kindness is represented by the leaping bunny logo that appears on product labels. *Cruelty free certified by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008

Avalon Organics Rosemary Shampoo, 32 fl oz Avalon Organics Rosemary Conditioner, 32 fl. oz Avalon Organics Shampoo, Clarifying Lemon, 11 Oz Avalon Organics Conditioner, Clarifying Lemon, 11 Oz More Hair Care Products from Avalon Organics Formulated for thin and limp hair, this shampoo, containing a medley of Rosemary Essential Oil, Quinoa Protein, Calendula, Aloe and Vitamin E, thoroughly cleanses hair while reinforcing volume from root to tip. Formulated for thin and limp hair, this conditioner, containing a medley of Rosemary Essential Oil, Quinoa Protein, Calendula, Aloe and Vitamin E, lightly conditions hair while reinforcing volume from root to tip. Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Shampoo. Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and Clean
reviews.reviewText: My sister recommended this shampoo and it was definitely a good change to my scalp. I love it so much I subscribed to monthly deliveries. It is gentle, does not have harsh chemicals and leaves your hair feeling very clean, I am fan. Now the scent is not overpowering but a light mint and herb smell. I also tried the lavender but like this one the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans hair good
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo works really good and it gives a nice healthy shine to your hair. I also use the normalizing conditioner as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice shampoo. Stick with Avalon Organics and other natural brands to take care of your hair.
reviews.reviewText: The scent is pretty strong, but pleasant. The shampoo is very clean, and nice in general. If you're on the fence, I recommend it. There's nothing particularly special about it, except that Avalon keeps some of the potentially harmful ingredients out of their shampoos. You have to read labels carefully these days because there are so many pretenders who try to make their packaging look natural or organic.If you shampoo your hair daily, you probably don't need to use very much each day (a little squeeze will do just fine). This bottle can last a long time. It's a bit expensive, but not nearly as expensive as some brands that deposit a bunch of junk in your hair and pretend to be high-quality because they are "professional salon formulas" or some such nonsense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a fan!
reviews.reviewText: I had to come write this review because I have been struggling with an itchy, flaky scalp for awhile now, which is embarrassing as a woman. I found this online and decided to try because of the reviews. It is truly WONDERFUL! It has helped me so much and I have zero dandruff now. I bought a little scalp massager gadget to go with it and the shampoo makes my scalp feel cool and tingly. I leave it on for about 5 minutes to let it really sit on my scalp. I will say that my hair feels like it would be really tangled after I use this because it’s so clean but I just use a tad bit more conditioner and I’m shocked how easy the brush goes through afterwards. I’m not a huge fan of any kind of mint smell but this with the tea tree actually smells nice. It’s not going to smell all fruity like I usually like but it’s so worth it. I immediately bought 2 more bottles. I’m in love with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product but bad packaging!
reviews.reviewText: They put it in one package with a microphone and an electric razor! It’s good that the electrical appliances were in good packaging. A quarter of the shampoo spilled out, the lid was not closed properly. Same thing with hair conditioner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shampoo for fine, oily hair (less hair falls out too!)
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this product at Whole Foods on a whim.I have fine, very oily hair + scalp and have always had an issue with hair loss.This shampoo does not seem to foam up as easily as other shampoos but it makes up for it by making my scalp and hair less oily.I have also noticed a huge decrease in hair falling out, which makes me very happy because I would find a massive clump of hair in my hair catcher at the end of each shower.The smell is also mild and pleasant, nothing to harsh.This also makes my hair soft BUT I noticed that after several weeks of using, sections of my hair started to dry out.Since I have fine, oily hair I can't use conditioner but I have found that using rinse-out treatment on the ends of my hair fixes this problem.All in all, a great product that minimizes hair loss and hair oiliness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Product works great for dry, itchy scalp. First time I used it I got relief from itching. Second time even better. It lathers well and has a calming scent. I usually leave it on for about 5 minutes then rinse with cool water. I don't need conditioner. My hair is soft and shiny. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Gave me allergies / bad reaction + doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: I started using this product a a little over a week ago. I bought the shampoo and the conditioner because I'm switching all my products to natural /organic /vegan ones so it doesn't harm the environment or my body. This was the first natural shampoo I've tried.The shampoo itself is very astringent. My hair is very fine and once I put it on, my hair fells like rubber. It would be ok if the conditioner fixed it later, but that's not what happens. The conditioner doesn't do much. When I try to comb my hair, it's extremely tangled and not soft.I usually wash my hair every other day, and sometimes I even skip 2 days without washing it. But with this product, if I wash my hair in the morning, at night it will feel like it's dirty again.To make things worse, my scalp, the back of my neck, and the area behind my ears started itching, as if I had spent many days without washing my hair. At first I thought it was just dirty and I should just wash it. But then I started washing it pretty much every day, and the reaction just got worse.I just used some allergy cream (at least on my neck and back of ears, since the scalp has hair and it's hard to use creams...) and I'm hoping it's gonna help the itchy feeling. It's driving me crazy. I've never had allergies to any personal care products before. I'm surprised a "natural, organic, non gmo" product gave me that reaction.Unfortunately, this product is not eligible for returning. So it will just need to go to trash. Very disappointed.

La principal razón de haberlo comprado es que está aprobado por la EWG, que verifica la seguridad en ingredientes cosméticos. A veces por evitar productos dañinos sacrificas otros aspectos, pero este producto además de tener buenos ingredientes controla muy bien el frizz en mi cabello rizado, lo deja brillante, ligero, controla la caspa y deja mi cuero cabelludo muy limpio. Es un 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 21, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived in perfect packaging - works very well - better than Head & Shoulders
reviews.reviewText: This is way better than head and shoulders. EWG lists this at the very highest end of the organic/natural scale of products, and it works for my dandruff/seborrheic dermatitis issue. I don't find myself itching my head as much, and I use this 2-3x per week as I am very active throughout the week. A few people are complaining about the smell. The smell is not bad at all. Make sure you buy the corresponding conditioner too. I will definitely buy this again in the future.
Très bon shampooing qui vous laissera une sensation de fraîcheur! Vos cheveux apprécieront ce shampooing à la composition parfaite... mes cheveux naturels ont adoré...

Am surprised how much I like this shampoo. Smells very nice. It's not the easiest to use as it doesn't foam much so you have to use a good amount and take time to massage it in . However it works really well with my drug store conditioner and my hair is super smooth and soft after. Will definitely repurchase.
